title: AIDAG Chain
subtitle: Fully Autonomous AI-Powered Blockchain
description: The world's first fully autonomous cryptocurrency powered by SoulwareAI on BSC Chain. No human intervention, pure AI governance.
heroSubtitle: AIDAG Chain combines SoulwareAI technology with DAO governance on Binance Smart Chain to create a truly autonomous ecosystem
feature1Desc: Powered by SoulwareAI, all operations run without human intervention
feature2Desc: Built on Binance Smart Chain for fast, low-cost transactions
tokenomicsText: Maximum supply of 21,000,000 AIDAG tokens. 3,001,000 tokens allocated to founders (1 year lock). Remaining tokens managed by SoulwareAI + DAO for presale, bonuses, and liquidity.
rule40: 40% of sales revenue goes to SoulwareAI + DAO liquidity pool (Autonomous Pool)
rule60: 60% of sales revenue goes to founder wallet
transparencyText: All operations are verified through smart contracts and visible on BSCScan. DAO members can verify autonomous operation by checking contract addresses.
presaleDesc: Secure your AIDAG tokens before public launch. Early supporters receive bonus allocations.
daoDesc: Participate in the autonomous governance of AIDAG Chain. Create proposals, vote, and shape the future.
docsDesc: Complete technical documentation for AIDAG Chain ecosystem
copyright: AIDAG Chain - Fully Autonomous AI Blockchain
firstAutonomousEcosystem: The first fully autonomous ecosystem in crypto history
